ARABIC: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not do anything to harm her or the punishment of a terrible day will come down on you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not treat her unkindly or the punishment of a grievous day will fall on you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do not molest her lest the chastisement of an Awesome Day should seize you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not cause her to suffer lest you become subject to the torment of the great day (of Judgment)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And do not touch her with evil intentions for the punishment of the Great Day will seize you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And touch her not with harm, lest the torment of a Great Day should seize you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And do not touch her with evil, lest the punishment of a grievous day should overtake you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and do not touch her with malice so that there seize you the chastisement of a dreadful day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And touch her not with ill lest there come on you the retribution of an awful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so do her no harm, or the punishment of an awful day will befall you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And touch her not with ill, lest there take hold of you the torment of a Mighty Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not cause her any harm, for then you shall be seized by the punishment of a terrible day.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Touch her not with harm, lest the Penalty of a Great Day seize you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And touch her not with harm, lest the torment of a Great Day seize you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not touch her with malice so that punishment of a dreadful day seizes you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And do not touch her with harm, lest the punishment of a great day seizes you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:156] And do not cause her any harm, for then you shall be seized by the chastisement of an awful day’, [awful] because of the awfulness of the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And touch her not with ill) do not hamstrung her (lest there come on you the retribution of an awful day.
